definition: to dispel doubts/to clear up confusion
acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
surname Xie
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection
to transport under guard
to confuse/to be puzzled

sentences.english: We always think there’s some “authority” out there who can give us the answer.
sentences.chinese: 我們常以爲有專家能夠答疑解惑。

sentences.english: We can read to find tracks, improve relationships, and balance our life.
sentences.chinese: 讀書可以解惑，改善人際關係，平衡生活。

sentences.english: Jens Lehmann is returning to Arsenal to pass on his eccentricity to the Gunners' next generation of stars.
sentences.chinese: 萊曼將回歸阿森納爲下一代的槍手們傳道授業解惑。

sentences.english: Besides, I will help you solve problems in learning Chinese if I can.
sentences.chinese: 當然，也樂爲“老外”漢語學習釋疑解惑。

sentences.english: Teacher, preach, teach, dispel doubt also.
Teacher, preach to teach to dispel doubt also.
A total of 3300 staff and volunteers will be in place to provide help for subway passengers.
sentences.chinese: 3300名工作人員及志願者將爲乘客購票答疑解惑。

definition: to dispel doubts/to remove ambiguities

to dispel doubts/to clear up difficulties

to give instructions/to give advice
to straighten out/to explain/to ease sb's anxiety
to point out/to indicate/to give directions/to show how (to do sth)/to censure/to pick at
to give directions
to impart/to pass on/to teach

a maze/to lose the way/bewildering
